subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] sounds like,

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

True.

Being a paranormal investigator, I do understand why colleges have t=
o be like that though. Just like when I am on investigations, I have to sti=
ck to just the proven facts. I can't just believe something, as that is sub=
jective. That doesn't mean that in my head I am not drawing my own conclusi=
ons based on what I believe, but I just have to keep that part of it to mys=
elf.

Colleges can't really teach you about unproven terms and ideologies. =
They can talk about them, but can't really teach you them, as they haven't =
been proven to exist, therefore there is no correct way.

Just like paranor=
mal investigating. There is no right or wrong way to do it as the field has=
 not been proven to exist.


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Snowfi=
reL@... 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 20, 2009=
 9:25 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] sounds like,






  You know, April it's=
 going to be difficult to convince some of those people too, can you imagin=
e the look on some of their faces lol when they find out how accurate this =
all is? lol

  In a message dated 5/20/2009 11:19:20 A.M. Eastern Daylight =
Time, april@... writes:



    =EF=BB=BF 

    Sci=
ence people will tell you there is no astral. The term "Astral" was coined =
by the first people who experienced this realm. But all words were coined. =
Even words such as dog or cat. 

    Also, subconscious means below conscio=
us or not conscious. So it isn't incorrect, though maybe some scholarly typ=
es will tell you it isn't proper. Again, all words were coined.

    You ha=
ve to remember that colleges and schools are mostly made up by people, peop=
le who think only scientifically. I know-not all people in colleges think t=
his way, but that is what learning institutions are based on. They reject a=
ny term they can't grasp or understand under a microscope.

    All this is=
 besides the point though.


      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From=
: SnowfireL@... 
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesd=
ay, May 20, 2009 9:05 AM
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] sounds like,



     =
 The word is really unconscious, the word sub. was coined by lay people, bu=
t any psychologist will tell us the word to use is unconscious because it i=
s the correct term, Psych's make a joke about us  lay people using the word=
 subconscious to mean the same thing,  I had 12 credits toward my PhD but, =
til ran out of money.  I understand what you are saying though, the word "a=
stral" is also a made up word, as is many of the new terms out there like "=
ascended master" and "channel" I think they refer to guide and medium, resp=
ectively.sf

      In a message dated 5/20/2009 10:54:36 A.M. Eastern Dayli=
ght Time, april@... writes:
        subconscious
